title: INDEX_OF
description: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of substring within string (case-sensitive). Optionally starts searching from index_optional. Returns -1 if not found.

parameters.name: index_optional
parameters.description: The starting index for the search (zero-based). Defaults to 0.

examples:
INDEX_OF("SystemA-12345-Order-ABC", "-", 10)
-- Returns 13. Finds '-' starting search from index 10.
